16148.en:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>Magnus, this is an emergency. You need to accompany
Rigg and summon Captain Spindle now!<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16148.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「マグナスよ　緊急の用件だ。
　今から　リッグを伴って
　スピンドル兵士長を　呼んできてくれ！<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16148.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>: 매그너스, 급한 안건이 생겼다.
　지금 당장 릭과 함께
　스핀들 병사단장을 불러 오도록!<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16148.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>马格纳斯，有一件紧急的事。
你现在和里格一起
把斯宾多尔士兵长叫来。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16148.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>馬格納斯，有一件緊急的事。
你現在和里格一起
把斯賓德士兵長叫來！<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16149.ja: <start_lip_sync n00130 _normal m00001>「は　はあ。私が……ですか？<stop_lip_animation n00130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16149.ko: <start_lip_sync n00130 _normal m00001>: 예, 예? 제가…… 말입니까?<stop_lip_animation n00130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16149.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00130 _normal m00001>唔……要我去吗？<stop_lip_animation n00130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16149.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00130 _normal m00001>唔……要我去嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16150.en:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>Being the counselor, if you call for Spindle, he'll
panic and come running, won't he. Hurry, be on your
way!<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16150.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「参謀である　お前が　呼びにいけば
　スピンドルも　あわてて　駆けつけるじゃろう。
　ほれ　さっさと行ってこい！<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16150.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>: 참모인 그대가 부르러 가면
　스핀들도 바로 달려올 것 아닌가.
　자, 어서 다녀오도록!<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16150.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>你是参谋，你去叫他的话，
斯宾多尔一定会急匆匆赶来的。
好了，快去吧！<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16150.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>你是參謀，你去叫他的話，
斯賓德一定會急匆匆地趕來的。
好了，快去吧！<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16151.en: <start_lip_sync n00130 _normal m00001>...As you wish.<stop_lip_animation n00130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16151.ja: <start_lip_sync n00130 _normal m00001>「……仰せのままに。<stop_lip_animation n00130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16151.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00130 _normal m00001>听从吩咐。<stop_lip_animation n00130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16152.en:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>With that, the room is clear. Now... There is but one
reason for this discussion: Gazbaran's Fang.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16152.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「これで　人払いできたな。
　さて……　相談というのは　他でもない。
　例の　ガズバランの牙のことじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16152.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>: 이걸로 듣는 귀가 사라졌군.
　자, 그럼…… 의논할 일이란 건 바로
　가즈바란의 이빨에 관해서일세.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16152.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>好了，我把旁人都支开了。
接下来……要和你商量一件事。
上次说过，加斯帕兰之牙的事。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16152.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>這下，我把旁人都支開了。
接下來……要和你商量一件事。
就是那個加茲巴朗之牙的事。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16153.en:
Ever since, we've been tracking their whereabouts, but it seems as if they have foreknowledge of our actions.
They take countermeasures and deal us nothing but more damage.
16153.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「あれからも　ヤツらの行方を追っているのだが
　まるで　こちらの行動を予知しているかのように
　作戦の裏をかかれ　被害ばかり増えておる。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16153.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>: 그 뒤에도 놈들의 행방을 쫓고 있네만
　우리의 움직임을 내다보기라도 한 것처럼
　작전의 허를 찔려 피해만 커지고 있네.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16153.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>自那之后，我一直在追寻他们的行踪，
但他们好像预知到我们的行动一样，
我们的作战计划被识破，损失一直在增加。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16153.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>自那之後，我一直在追尋他們的行蹤，
但他們好像預知到我們的行動一樣，
我們的作戰計畫被識破，損失一直在增加。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16154.en:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>Frankly, I don't like to think it, but... I suspect there is
a spy who is leaking information to Gazbaran's
Fang.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16154.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「正直　考えたくはないのだが……
　わしは　ガズバランの牙に情報を流す
　スパイの存在を　疑っておる。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16154.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>: 솔직히 내 생각이 틀리길 바라네만……
　난 가즈바란의 이빨에 정보를 흘리는
　첩자가 있는 게 아닌가 의심하고 있네.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16154.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>说真的，我很不愿意这么想……
但还是怀疑
这里有向加斯帕兰之牙泄露情报的间谍。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16154.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>說真的，我很不願意這麼想……
但還是懷疑這裡有向加茲巴朗之牙
洩露情報的間諜。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16155.en:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>When I think back to the gang's first appearance, how
could they have shown up at the hunting site when
we traveled in secret?<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16155.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「思えば　最初に　連中が現れたとき
　ヤツらは　どうして　お忍びで行われた
　狩りの現場に　現れることができたのか？<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16155.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>: 생각해 보면 처음에도
　비공식 행사였던 마물 사냥 현장에
　어떻게 놈들이 나타날 수 있었겠는가?<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16155.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>回想那伙人最初出现的时候，
为何他们会出现在
秘密进行的狩猎现场？<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16155.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>回想那夥人最初出現的時候，
為何他們會出現在
祕密進行的狩獵現場？<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16156.en:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>The only ones with the knowledge of the hunt being
held there were the members of the party and Janga
at Zama Beacon.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16156.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「あれが行われるのを　知り得たのは
　狩りに参加したメンバーと
　ザマ烽火台にいる　ジャンガのみ。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16156.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>: 마물 사냥이 열린다는 걸 알고 있었던 건
　사냥에 참가한 멤버와
　자마 봉화대에 있던 장가뿐일세.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16156.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>知道狩猎活动的，
只有参加狩猎的人员
和扎马烽火台的伽戈。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16156.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>知道狩獵活動的，
只有參加狩獵的人員
和札馬烽火台的占迦。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16157.en:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>Moreover, if they knew of the previous strategy to
capture them in advance, the number of people privy
would be further limited...<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16157.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「その上で　前回の　ヤツらを捕らえる作戦を
　事前に　知っていた者となると
　さらに人数は　限られる……。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16157.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>: 거기에 지난 기습 작전을
　사전에 알고 있었던 자를 추리면
　범위는 더 좁아지지…….<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16157.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>再从这个范围内
找出预先知道上次逮捕计划的人，
怀疑对象的范围就更小了……<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16157.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>再從這個範圍內
找出預先知道上次逮捕計畫的人，
懷疑對象的範圍就更小了……<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16158.en:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>Yes. You and Janga, excluding the other members.
Counselor Magnus, Captain Spindle, Royal Guard Rigg.
...Those 3 are the suspects.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16158.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「そう。お前さんと　ジャンガ以外の参加者。
　参謀マグナス　スピンドル兵士長
　近衛兵リッグ……この３人が　容疑者じゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16158.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>: 그렇네, 그대와 장가 외의 참가자.
　참모 매그너스, 스핀들 병사단장,
　근위병 릭…… 이 3명이 용의자일세.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16158.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>没错，就是除你和伽戈以外其他参加狩猎的人。
参谋马格纳斯、斯宾多尔士兵长
以及卫兵里格……这３个人都有嫌疑。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16158.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>沒錯，就是除了你和占迦以外其他參加狩獵的人。
參謀馬格納斯、斯賓德士兵長
以及近衛兵里格……這３個人都有嫌疑。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16159.en:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001><pc>, I want you to help me set traps to find
out who among the 3 is the spy.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16159.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「<pc>よ。お前さんには　３人の中の
　誰がスパイなのか　探りだすために
　ワナを仕掛けるのを　手伝ってほしいのじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16159.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 그 3명 중 누가
　첩자인지를 밝혀낼 수 있도록
　그대가 함정을 파는 걸 도와주었으면 하네.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16159.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001><pc>，
我希望你能帮忙设一个圈套，
查出他们3人当中谁是间谍。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16159.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001><pc>，
我希望你能幫忙設一個圈套，
查出他們３人當中誰是間諜。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16160.en:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>After this, I will invite the members of the hunt to the
south of Gilzad Region to Hunter's Rest Area, deep
inside of Hunter's Den.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16160.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「これから　わしは　狩りの参加メンバーを
　ギルザッド地方の南にある　狩人のほら穴の最奥
　狩人の休憩所まで　誘いだすつもりじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16160.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>: 이제부터 난 사냥에 참가했던 이들을
　길자드 지방 남쪽, 사냥꾼의 동굴 안쪽에 있는
　사냥꾼의 쉼터로 유인할 생각이네.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16160.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>我想邀请参加狩猎的成员
去基尔扎德地区以南的
猎人的洞穴最深处的猎人的休息处。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16160.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>我想邀請參加狩獵的成員
前往基爾札德地方南部，
去獵人洞穴最深處的獵人休息處。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16161.en:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>The pretext being... A sudden urge to hunt or the like
will do, I believe. If I leave the castle, naturally, the
spy will make some kind of move.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16161.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「理由は……急に　狩りがしたくなったとかで
　いいじゃろう。わしが　城から出るとなれば
　当然　スパイも　何か行動を起こすはずだ。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16161.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>: 이유는…… 갑자기 사냥이 하고 싶어졌다고
　하면 되겠지. 내가 성 밖으로 나가는 걸 알면
　첩자도 뭔가 움직임을 보일 터.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16161.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>理由嘛……就说我突然想狩猎了。
只要我出城，
间谍一定会有所行动。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16161.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>理由嘛……就說我突然想狩獵了。
只要我出城，
間諜一定會有所行動。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16162.en:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>You are to hide in Hunter's Rest Area first, and when
the spy is identified, capture him immediately.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16162.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「お前さんは　先に　狩人の休憩所に
　隠れていて　スパイが判明したら
　速やかに　そやつを取り押さえるのじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16162.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>: 그대는 사냥꾼의 쉼터에 숨어 있다가
　첩자가 밝혀지면 바로 놈을 붙잡아 주게.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16162.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>你潜伏在猎人的休息处
弄清谁是间谍之后，
立刻把那家伙逮捕！<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16162.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>你潛伏在獵人休息處
弄清誰是間諜後
就立刻逮捕那傢伙！<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16163.en:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>...I know it's a risky gamble. But as it is, I can't stand
the thought of harming our soldiers more by doing
nothing.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16163.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「……危険な賭けであることは　承知の上。
　だが　このまま　何もしないで　兵士たちの
　被害を増やすことは　たえられん。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16163.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>: ……위험한 도박이라는 건 잘 아네.
　하지만 이대로 병사들의 피해가
　커지는 걸 지켜만 볼 수는 없네.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16163.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>……我知道这是一场危险的赌博。
但是，一直这样坐以待毙的话，
只会增加士兵们的死伤。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16163.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>……我知道這是一場危險的賭注。
但是，一直這樣坐以待斃的話，
只會增加士兵們的死傷。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16164.en:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>Please, <pc>! Will you help me with this
operation?<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16164.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「頼む　<pc>！
　わしの　この作戦を手伝ってくれんか？<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16164.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>: 부탁하겠네, <pc>!
　내 작전을 도와주지 않겠나?<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16164.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>拜托了，<pc>！
你愿意帮我完成这次的作战行动吗？<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16164.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>拜託了，<pc>！
你願意幫我完成這次的作戰行動嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16165.en:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>As expected of you, <pc>; most reasonable.
Had I confided in Magnus, he would have stopped me
for sure.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16165.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「さすが　<pc>は　話がわかるな。
　もし　マグナスなんぞに打ち明けたら
　絶対に　止められたじゃろうよ。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16165.ko:

<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>The plan will be in response to the spy's actions.
You are to hide in Hunter's Rest Area first, and when
the spy is identified, capture him immediately.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16187.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「これに反応して　行動を起こすであろうスパイを
　先に行って　隠れていた　お前さんが
　速やかに　取り押さえるという手はずじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16187.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>: 이 정보에 반응해 첩자가 움직이기 시작하면
　먼저 가서 숨어 있던 그대가
　바로 그자를 붙잡는 걸세.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16187.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>对此，间谍一定会有所行动。
我要你事先潜伏在那里，
然后迅速将间谍逮捕。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16187.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>對此，間諜一定會有所行動。
我要你事先潛伏在那裡，
然後迅速逮捕間諜。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16188.en:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>...I know it's a risky gamble. But as it is, I can't
stand the thought of harming our soldiers more by
doing nothing.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16188.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「……危険な賭けであることは　承知の上。
　だが　このまま　何もしないで　兵士たちの
　被害を増やすことには　たえられん。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16188.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>: ……위험한 도박이라는 건 잘 아네.
　하지만 이대로 병사들의 피해가
　커지는 걸 지켜만 볼 수는 없네.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16188.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>……我知道这是一场危险的赌博。
但是，一直这样坐以待毙的话，
只会增加士兵们的死伤。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16188.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>……我知道這是一場危險的賭注。
但是，一直這樣坐以待斃的話，
只會增加士兵們的死傷。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16189.en:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>Please, <pc>! Will you help me with
this operation?<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16189.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「頼む　<pc>！

16189.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>: 부탁하겠네, <pc>!

16189.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>拜托了，<pc>！
你愿意帮我完成这次的作战行动吗？<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16189.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>拜託了，<pc>！
你願意幫我完成這次的作戰行動嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28573.en:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>As expected of you, <pc>; most reasonable.
Had I confided in Magnus, he would have stopped me

<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「さすが　<pc>は　話がわかるな。

28573.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>: 역시 {pc}|hpp(은,는) 말이 통하는군.

28573.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>不愧是<pc>，真通情达理。

28573.zh-Hant:

28574.en:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>...Oh, soon Magnus should be back with Spindle and

<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「……っと　そろそろ　マグナスたちが

28574.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>: ……이런, 슬슬 매그너스와 릭이
　스핀들을 데리고 돌아올 때가 되었군.
　그대는 먼저 출발하게나!<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28574.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>……哦，马格纳斯他们

28574.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>……喔，馬格納斯他們

28575.en:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>I'm glad to hear that, but... It seems you have a

28575.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>: 대답은 고맙네만……
　보아하니 그대는
　이미 예정이 꽉 찬 것 같군.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28575.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>我很高兴你能答应……
但是看样子
你的行程已经满了啊。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28575.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>我很高興你能答應……

28576.en:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>Okay, let's wait a while for the start of the
operation. You hurry and settle your requests.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「よし。作戦開始は　しばらく待とう。

28576.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>: 그렇다면 작전은 잠시 미루기로 하지.
　그대는 그 사이에 빨리
　다른 일을 처리하고 오게나.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28576.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>好吧，那作战行动等一会儿再开始，
你先尽快去把那些委托

28576.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>好吧。作戰等一陣子再開始。
你盡快去把那些委託
解決完吧。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28581.en:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>Currently, the timing's not right, you say. However,
I don't intend on giving up.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28581.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「今は　タイミングではないということか。
　しかし　わしは　あきらめるつもりはないぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28581.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>: 지금은 때가 아닌 것 같군.
　하지만 난 포기하지 않을 걸세.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28581.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>现在不是时候啊。

28581.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>現在不是時候啊。

28582.en:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>If you happen to change your mind, please, at once,

28582.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「もし　気が変わったら　すぐ　わしに
　声をかけてくれ。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28582.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>: 만약 마음이 바뀌면
　바로 내게 말을 걸어 주게.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28582.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>如果你改变了主意

28582.zh-Hant:

就立刻跟我說一聲。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28577.en:
<start_lip_sync n00130 _normal m00001>King Grossner. Captain Spindle was not in his room.

28577.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00130 _normal m00001>「グロスナー王。
　スピンドル兵士長は　自室にいませんでした。
　どうやら　巡察に出かけているようです。<stop_lip_animation n00130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<start_lip_sync n00130 _normal m00001>: 전하, 스핀들 병사단장이 자리에 없습니다.

28578.en:
<start_lip_sync n00130 _normal m00001>What should we do? Should we send someone into town
to search for him?<stop_lip_animation n00130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28578.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00130 _normal m00001>「どうしましょう？　
　城下町のどこかには　いるでしょうから

28578.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00130 _normal m00001>: 어떻게 하시겠습니까?
　아마도 시가지 어딘가에 있을 테니
　사람을 보내 찾아오라 할까요?<stop_lip_animation n00130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28578.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00130 _normal m00001>怎么办？
他应该在城区的某处。
要派人去找他吗？<stop_lip_animation n00130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28578.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00130 _normal m00001>怎麼辦？
他應該在城鎮的某處。
要派人去找他嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28579.en:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>...Aah, leave it. For now, let's put that matter

<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「……ああ　もういいぞ。
　とりあえず　その件は　先送りだ。

28579.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>: ……아니, 이만 됐다.
　일단 이 안건은 뒤로 미루기로 하지.
　수고 많았다, 매그너스.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28579.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>……啊，不用了。
这件事暂且先放一放吧。
辛苦你了，马格纳斯。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28579.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>……啊，不用了。
這件事暫且先放一邊吧。

16190.en:
<start_lip_sync n00130 _normal m00001>Are you serious, King Grossner!? At a time like this,
you would do something like monster hunting, I think
that would be insane!<stop_lip_animation n00130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16190.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00130 _normal m00001>「本気ですか　グロスナー王！？
　このようなときに　魔物狩りに行かれるなど
　正気の沙汰とは　思えませぬ！<stop_lip_animation n00130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16190.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00130 _normal m00001>: 진심이십니까, 전하!?
　이런 시기에 마물 사냥을 가시겠다니
　대체 무슨 생각이십니까!?<stop_lip_animation n00130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16190.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00130 _normal m00001>你是认真的吗？古罗斯纳王！
在这种时候出去狩猎怪物，
我可不认为是明智之举！<stop_lip_animation n00130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16190.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00130 _normal m00001>你是認真的嗎？古羅斯納王！
在這種時候出去狩獵怪物，
我可不認為是明智之舉！<stop_lip_animation n00130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16191.en:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>A time like this is precisely why! Ever since Gazbaran's
Fang appeared, I've been under a lot of stress...<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16191.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「このようなとき　だからこそじゃ！
　ガズバランの牙が　現れて以来
　わしのストレスは　たまる一方……。<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16191.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>: 이런 시기이기 때문이다!
　가즈바란의 이빨이 나타난 뒤로 계속
　과중한 스트레스에 시달리고 있으니…….<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16191.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>就应该在这种时候去！
自从加斯帕兰之牙出现之后，
我的压力就不断增大……<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16191.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>就應該在這種時候去！
自從加茲巴朗之牙出現後，
我的壓力就不斷增大……<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16192.en:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>Around here, if we don't get relax, we'll collapse from
worry! If we do that, we'll be right where they want
us!<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「この辺りで　気晴らしをせんことには
　心労で倒れてしまうわ！　そうなれば
　それこそ　ヤツらの思うツボではないか！<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16237.en:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>...Hmm. If that's what you desire, I have no choice.

16237.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「……ふむ。お前が　望むなら　仕方ない。

16237.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>: ……흠, 그대가 원한다면 어쩔 수 없지.

16237.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>……唔。既然你提出这要求，我也没办法。

16237.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>……唔。既然你提出這要求，那好吧。

16238.en:
